name: Bizverse World
introduce: Bizverse World is a Metaverse for business that is built on a real-based location 3D map of the natural world to develop the digital economy and digital society, according to the “Digital Twin” and “Meta-Economy” models. With the entire assistance of VR/AR technology, blockchain, and Web3, this Metaverse platform intends to develop new business channels for traditional businesses and a digital environment for people to carry out building activities similar to the actual world. Bizverse ecosystem includes an NFT Marketplace where people could creatively create, trade anh manage their digital assets.
